name: Krypton Planet Escape
description:
Hi, We are delighted to share our new game with you :)

Game Name: Krypton Planet Escape

Description:   In this game, Superman need your help to solve the mystery puzzles to find a way out of this deadly Krypton planet. Good luck and have fun!

Game Page: http://www.freeroomescape.com/krypton-planet-escape/

Game Pixel Size: 820x500

Walkthrough: 

Thanks for supporting our game, we will continue to make more fun and addicting free games :)

Cheers,

Free Room Escape
